name: Data for Total Maximum Daily Loads and Escherichia coli trends in Texas freshwater streams
description: This dataset includes E. coli bacteria measurements and associated flow data for 778 water quality monitoring stations in Texas. The data was used to evaluate trends in E. coli bacteria concentration and the effectiveness of TMDLs at reducing E. coli concentrations.

variableMeasured.name: ActivityStartDate
variableMeasured.description: Recorded date of monitoring activity

variableMeasured.name: MonitoringLocationIdentifier
variableMeasured.description: Location of monitoring activity (TCEQ SWQM station)

variableMeasured.name: CharacteristicName
variableMeasured.description: Monitoring characteristic name

variableMeasured.name: ResultMeasureValue
variableMeasured.description: Reported E. coli lab result (MPN/100 mL)

variableMeasured.name: AU
variableMeasured.description: Assessment Unit identifier for Monitoring Location

variableMeasured.name: Impaired
variableMeasured.description: Indicates impairement status of the monitoring location

variableMeasured.name: TMDL
variableMeasured.description: TMDL status for Monitoring Location (1 = TMDL, 0 = No TMDL)

variableMeasured.name: Completion_Date
variableMeasured.description: Date that TMDL was adopted (YYYY-MM-DD, or NA for No TMDL)

variableMeasured.name: geometry
variableMeasured.description: Lon, Lat

variableMeasured.name: USGSSite_No
variableMeasured.description: Associated USGS Stream Gage

variableMeasured.name: Flow
variableMeasured.description: Mean daily streamflow value of ActivityStartDate (cfs)

variableMeasured.name: tmdl_status
variableMeasured.description: Coding for TMDL category used to calculate odds-ratio (Pre-TMDL, Post-TMDL, No-TMDL)

variableMeasured.name: fa_pvalue
variableMeasured.description: p-value from the flow-adjusted Mann-Kendall trend test

variableMeasured.name: fa_kendallsTau
variableMeasured.description: Kendall's Tau from the flow-adjusted Mann-Kendall trend test

variableMeasured.name: fa_slope
variableMeasured.description: Sen Slope from the flow-adjusted Mann-Kendall trend test

variableMeasured.name: fa_n
variableMeasured.description: number of samples used in the flow-adjusted Mann-Kendall trend test

variableMeasured.name: pvalue
variableMeasured.description: p-value from the unadjusted Mann-Kendall trend test

variableMeasured.name: kendallsTau
variableMeasured.description: Kendall's Tau from the unadjusted Mann-Kendall trend test

variableMeasured.name: slope
variableMeasured.description: Sen Slope from the unadjusted Mann-Kendall trend test

variableMeasured.name: n
variableMeasured.description: number of samples used in the unadjusted Mann-Kendall trend test
